law.catch_line: Designation of certified versions of KRS -- Standards -- Distribution to state law library.

text.section:
In response to a written request from a publisher, the Commission may designate a version of the Kentucky Revised Statutes as a certified version if:
The version meets the requirements of KRS 7.134; and
The publisher of the version enters into a written agreement with the Commission.

The Commission may furnish to the state law library, without cost, on request of the Chief Justice, a sufficient number of copies of the Kentucky Revised Statutes to enable the state law librarian to carry out duties imposed on him by law.

law.history: Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 46, sec. 3, effective January 1, 1997. -- Amended 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 111, sec. 14, effective July 13, 1984. -- Amended 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 62, sec. 1, effective June 19, 1976. -- Created 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 85, secs. 1(5) and 3, effective June 16, 1966.
